titles.title: Urging the United Arab Emirates to immediately end any activities enabling money laundering in violation of United States sanctions against Iran.
Urging the United Arab Emirates to immediately end any activities enabling money laundering in violation of United States sanctions against Iran.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the failure of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to counter money-laundering activities conducted to bypass U.S. sanctions on Iran and urges the UAE to resolve the shortcomings in its laws against money laundering.
